titles.title: Maritime Technical Corrections Act of 2018
To amend titles 14 and 46, United States Code, to make technical corrections with respect to Coast Guard and shipping authorities, and for other purposes.
Maritime Technical Corrections Act of 2018
Maritime Technical Corrections Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.
Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure. H. Rept. 115-1015.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 794.

bill.summary:
Maritime Technical Corrections Act of 2018
This bill revises several provisions of title 14 (Coast Guard) of the United States Code, including provisions related to training course requirements for Coast Guard officers and employees.
The bill also makes technical corrections and modifications throughout title 46 (Shipping), including to authorize the Coast Guard to maintain different structural fire protection, manning, operating, and equipment requirements for vessels.
